attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Listen to me when I say its gonna brake your phone. First it took over 2 nights to download and next it said it would like to make call then it told me that if I don’t leave a good review it won’t let me out of the app so I put 5 starts in the app and it brought me here that’s super annoying that I can’t be honest about your app.

attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER
attributes.review: this app took 3 hours to download and on top of that I can’t even open it with out my phone completely shutting off and I have a new iPhone also when I tried to delete the app my screen will freeze and shut off my phone again this is complete annoying and unacceptable

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: The worst app I’ve ever used, it turned my phone background and lock screen orange and deleted all of my family photos. Since downloading I haven’t been able to use any other apps and crashes my phone when I try. I worry I may need to get a new phone, this one may never recover.

attributes.title: Horrible app!!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I got a VIRUS on my phone!! It tried to call all my other news apps FAKE NEWS! and created a virtual WALL between me and my Mexican relatives in my contacts. It also made me retweet white supremacy type tweets but then quickly deleted it so it can say it was an “accident”. It also slowed down my phone by HOURS!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD‼️‼️
attributes.review: This app sent my phone of fire when I opened it. At first it started lagging and glitching. It logged into all my social media websites and hacked my accounts. Afterward my phone was getting really hot and smoke started to get out of it soooo I threw it and ran outside. Seconds later my house caught on fire and I could call anyone to help. Don’t download this app plz😚

attributes.title: Almost killed my cat!! 😡🤬😿
attributes.review: this app almost killed 😱🔪🔪 my cat!! 🤬🤬😾  i downloaded this app thinking 🤔🤭 i could praise 🙏🏻 the orange cheeto man 🍊🧡🧡 but instead 🙄 it started saying hateful 😡 comments to my cat 😭🤬😾 like “u are a STINKY KITTIN” 😱😤 and “go eat a mouse UGLY” 😳🤬🐭 my cat almost 😩 had a heart attack 💓💔😨 and me and my mom 👩‍👧 had to call an ambulance 🚑 to take my kitty 😿to the hospitable 🏩🙀😭😭 she almost died 😵 because of this app!! 🤬😡

attributes.title: Horrible do not download
attributes.review: First of all it took so long to download (even though I have fast WiFi) and I kept hearing static when I opened the app and when I served it up it said that it may be the microphone  but why would the microphone be on unless it’s recording?? It was recording me hearing everything I say do not download for your own SAFTEY!!

attributes.title: Ugh don’t download this app.
attributes.review: this app is horrible, let alone who it’s for. but i tried downloading it see if i could possibly give our terrible president a chance, the app took forever to download and when it finally was finished there wasn’t much to do on the app anyways, you’d be a foul to download this insulting piece of trash..

attributes.title: The app sabotaged me😥
attributes.userName: BEAT ME UP SIS BEAT ME UP
attributes.review: I wanted to vote for the beautiful racist and more president🤩 but when I downloaded it Donald trump flew into my house from a unicorn and not only ate ALL the food he send the aliens from Area 51 to my house but luckily I’m a black belt😎 then Donald said are you lost baby gorl and I was for sure not lost but scared so I kicked him in the wiener and deleted the app then everything was back to normal😗

attributes.title: WORST THING EVER
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE !! unless you want a mob of ogres running to your door DONT DO IT . i don’t know how you guys allowed this burnt expired cheeto dried up orange peel man make a whole app . once i opened the app it sent out a bird call to all ogres in my town , i didn’t omen know we had ogres :(( !! i had to sacrifice my pet toe nail for them to go away 😞 rip nailly 🕊💔🖤. i don’t know how the troompa loopas did it 😞👋🏾!
